topic.title: Proxy.Zerocat.Eu - New Zeronet Proxy!
topic.body:
Features:
- ClouDNS.net registered domain (paid).
- Hosted on a VPS (paid).
- Optimized for big files, although currently there's only a 19gb optional files limit (vps size is 20gb). 
 
- DNS points to CloudFlare, which will (hopefully) help with performance and hiding the host location.
- Optimized for Kopykate BIG (big.kopykate.bit).. the proxy allows fullscreen, and videos play almost instantly, provided there's enough seeders.
- We hope to become the official gateway to ZeroNet, in order to reach as many users as possible. 
- We will not use any ads, unlike The Pirate Bay, but users need to allow CoinHive. It will run at low speed so as to have minimal impact on user performance. If your AdBlock  blocks the miner, make sure it is disabled for proxy.zerocat.eu. Remember, this is real money we are putting on the server, and we will continue to make improvements..
 
This will take the load off of my home PC... yahoo!
 
..Long story short, my friend from college still hasn't finished building his VPS service. Hopefully by Christmas I'll be able to switch to his server and then see the difference. Then I can use Zerocat.eu and not have to hide anything from the admins.. lol

1510983074_1KEvkyRid4apYrPa2S4fdZFFHAruf.body:
> [bbtuxi2](#comment_1_14tkD6qqifoVQs5aKacz9vQJSME92za5cw): AdGuard has detected that this website is trying to use your browser as a blockchain currency miner. It can create significant CPU load.....................

It's throttled. Read the topic

1_1KGozab6jp6jA6zVM8cTFdzMmBasriNP4f.body:
It won't work. It's like trying to DoS a torrent file.. ... everyone who downloads the files, is both client and server.

Your best bet is trying to hack the computer and steal the private key.

1511133140_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL.body:
It's basically a copy of http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit, but with the YouTube logo.
Kopykate BIG was copied from ZeroUp, but I created the search functionality, user video list and video player. (Wasn't meant to compete with ZeroUp, anyway.. as ZeroUp is for sharing files, Kopykate is for video.)
